model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    A class modelling the board of a game of spectrangle.
    Author:
    P.M. Bos

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the Field identified by the given index

      • isFirstPlay

        public boolean isFirstPlay()
        Returns:
        true if this is the first play made in the game, false otherwise.

      • getFields

      • isValidField

        public boolean isValidField(int index)
        Determines if the given index identifies a valid. Field on the Board
        Parameters:
        index - the index to validate
        Returns:
        true if the given index identifies a valid Field, false otherwise

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(Tile tile,
                           int index,
                           int rotation)
        Determines if the given move is valid. A move is valid when: The tile is placed in an empty Field. The tile has at least the number of neighbours adjoining edges with said neighbours. The tile would have at least one neighbour.
        Parameters:
        rotation - the rotation to check.
        tile - a Tile to be moved.
        index - the index to move to.
        Returns:
        true if the given move is valid, false otherwise.

      • getIndex

        public static int getIndex(int row,
                           int column)
        Identifies the index given a row- and column index.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index.
        column - the column index.
        Returns:
        ,as an integer the, the index identified by the given row and column

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty(int index)
        Finds out if a Field identified by the given index is empty.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to verify.
        Returns:
        true if the Field does have a value of 0

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Finds out if the Board is full.
        Returns:
        true if all fields of the Board have a value of 0 or less, false otherwise.

      • getCopy

        public Board getCopy()
        Returns:
        a copy of the current state of the Board

      • getScore

        public int getScore(int index)
        Calculates the score of a Field identified by the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the field to check.
        Returns:
        the score of the Field as an integer.

      • edges

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Character> edges(int index)
        Finds the all the connecting edges of the Field identified by the given index. An edge is connecting when: A neighbour is occupied.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Field to check.
        Returns:
        A list containing the single character representations of all connecting edges.

      • isValidNeighbour

        public boolean isValidNeighbour(char neighbour)
        Checks whether the given neighbour is valid.
        Parameters:
        neighbour - the character to check.
        Returns:
        true if neighbour is valid, false otherwise.

      • getNeighbour

        public int getNeighbour(int index,
                        char neighbour)
        Finds the neighbour of the Field identified by the given index and neighbour.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Field to check.
        neighbour - specifies which neighbour to find. 'V' for vertical, 'L' for left, 'R' for right.
        Returns:
        the index of the neighbour, -1 if no such neighbour exists.

      • isEven

        public static boolean isEven(int n)
        Checks if a given integer is even.
        Parameters:
        n - the integer to check.
        Returns:
        true, if the given integer is even, false otherwise.

        Checks if the field belonging to the given index has an upward- or downward facing point.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to check.
        Returns:
        true if the point faces upwards, false otherwise.

        Returns:
        true if the board is empty, false otherwise.

      • getMapping

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer[]> getMapping()
        Creates a new map and fills it with the standard field mapping of spectrangle.
        Returns:
